guide.title: use guide
guide.content:
1. create database in mongo 
 2. change in config.json, host, db and collection

guide.title: config data json to database
guide.content:
1. insert objects in collections of database 
 2. use markdown 
 3. object structure: 
 ``` 
 { 
 title: string, 
 index: 2.5 
 content: 'string in markdown', 
 subItems: [array with title of children objects] 
} 
 ```
